name: CBRE Group, Inc.
description: CBRE Group, Inc. is a global leader in commercial real estate services and investments. Founded in 1906, CBRE has grown to become one of the largest and most integrated commercial real estate services firms in the world, providing a wide range of services to property owners, investors, and occupiers. The company operates in more than 100 countries and has a workforce of over 100,000 professionals dedicated to delivering exceptional service and innovative solutions. CBRE's services include property management, facility management, project management, leasing, investment sales, and capital markets advisory. The firm is renowned for its data-driven approach to real estate, utilizing advanced technology and analytics to optimize real estate portfolios and enhance asset performance. CBRE is also committed to sustainability, helping clients with green building certifications and energy-efficient solutions. The company's mission is to provide clients with the best possible outcomes through its integrated services and global reach, making it a trusted partner in the real estate sector.

seo.meta_title: CBRE Group, Inc. | Global Leader in Commercial Real Estate Services
seo.meta_description: Explore CBRE Group, Inc., a global leader in commercial real estate services and investments. Discover our range of services and commitment to innovation and sustainability.

faq.question: What services does CBRE provide?
faq.answer: CBRE provides a wide range of services including property management, leasing, investment sales, and capital markets advisory.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of CBRE?
faq.answer: Bob Sulentic is the CEO of CBRE Group, Inc.

faq.question: Where is CBRE headquartered?
faq.answer: CBRE is headquartered in Los Angeles, California, USA.
